00035 inline void
00036 myperror (char *errmsg, int errcode)
00037 {
00038         std::cerr << errmsg << " error code " << errcode;
00039         std::cerr << " : " << strerror (errcode) << std::endl;
00040 
00041         exit (errcode);
00042 }
00043 
00044 #define myerror(errmsg) { perror(errmsg); exit(errno); }
00045 
00046 #define myfunction_error myerror(__PRETTY_FUNCTION__)

00049 //#define mynassert(expr) { if (expr) myfunction_error }
00050 //#define mynassert(expr) { if(expr) perror(__PRETTY_FUNCTION__); }
00051 #define mynassert(expr) { int ass_res=expr; if(ass_res) {  std::cerr << "Error in function: " << __PRETTY_FUNCTION__ << " ";  myperror(__MYSTRING(expr),ass_res); }}

00053 #define myifcheck(expr) if((expr)<0) { std::cerr<<"Error in function "<<__PRETTY_FUNCTION__<<" "; myerror(__MYSTRING(expr));}

00058 // returns number of seconds from ...
00059 inline double
00060 mytimestamp ()
00061 {
00062         struct timeval tp;
00063         gettimeofday (&tp, NULL);
00064         return double (tp.tv_sec) + tp.tv_usec / 1000000.;
00065 }

00068 inline
00069         std::string
00070 mytmpfilename (std::string dir, std::string prefix)
00071 {
00072         //mydebug(cerr <<" TMP:"<< dir.c_str() <<":"<< prefix.c_str()<< endl);
00073         int rnd;
00074         char buffer[1024];
00075         std::string result;
00076         struct stat st;
00077 
00078         do
00079         {
00080 
00081                 rnd = rand ();
00082                 sprintf (buffer, "%u", rnd);
00083                 result = dir + prefix + buffer;
00084 
00085         }
00086         while (!lstat (result.c_str (), &st));
00087 
00088         if (errno != ENOENT)
00089                 myfunction_error
00090                         //  char * temp_name = tempnam(dir.c_str(),prefix.c_str());
00091                         //  if(!temp_name)
00092                         //    myfunction_error
00093                         //  std::string result(temp_name);
00094                         //  free(temp_name);
00095                         //  mydebug(cerr << __PRETTY_FUNCTION__ << ":" <<result << endl);
00096                         return result;
00097 }

00099 inline
00100         std::vector <
00101         std::string >
00102 split (const std::string & str, const std::string & sep)
00103 {
00104         std::vector < std::string > result;
00105         if (str.empty ())
00106                 return result;
00107 
00108         std::string::size_type CurPos (0), LastPos (0);
00109         while (1)
00110         {
00111                 CurPos = str.find (sep, LastPos);
00112                 if (CurPos == std::string::npos)
00113                         break;
00114 
00115                 std::string sub =
00116                         str.substr (LastPos,
00117                                     std::string::size_type (CurPos -
00118                                                             LastPos));
00119                 if (sub.size ())
00120                         result.push_back (sub);
00121 
00122                 LastPos = CurPos + sep.size ();
00123         };
00124 
00125         std::string sub = str.substr (LastPos);
00126         if (sub.size ())
00127                 result.push_back (sub);
00128         sub.return result;
00129 };

00133 inline
00134         std::string
00135 int2str (int i)
00136 {
00137         char buf[32];
00138         sprintf (buf, "%d", i);
00139         return std::string (buf);
00140 }
